title: [未汉化][1.6.4][spp/smp]更多末影珍珠More Enderpearls Mod
author: q2785492527
txt_content:
本帖最后由 q2785492527 于 2014-6-29 13:30 编辑 
  {:10_492:}大家肯定都在抱怨末影珍珠会伤血，这个mod可以做出各种功能的珍珠！

致命的安德珍珠：杀死任何砸到的东西爆炸安德珍珠:会爆炸！（爆炸不伤害你）无害的安德珍珠：不伤害你在传送时互换安德珍珠：互换敌人与你的位置旅行的珍珠：你与明珠旅行！(机翻）珍珠：通过时间旅行的时间！(机翻）维珍珠：到达终点并返回一个简单的方法！(机翻）
怪物-安德骷髅-安德鸡-安德苦力怕                                                                                              （你们肯定会说为什么图那么少，这个我到时来更新下）
下载地址：



More Enderpearls Mod v1.8[1.6.4].jar
(285.51 KB, 下载次数: 78)



2014-6-29 13:26 上传
点击文件名下载附件






更新日志：Update 1.8 : 27 days ago6/01/14-Thrown Enderpearls now render like their items
Bug Fixes:
MEP#11: Fixed server-side explosion from explosive ender pearl that glitched the blocks




Update 1.7 : 27 days ago6/01/14-Added Time Pearls
-Added Dimensional Pearls
-Added Dimensional Pearls
-Added 3 New Achievments
Bug Fixes:
MEP#10: Getting an achievment and restarting the game crashes it




Update 1.6.1 : 29 days ago5/30/14-Fixed Ender Skeleton and Creeper A.I.(Not a bug fix, I didn't make their A.I. good in the first place)
Bug Fixes:
MEP#09: Ender Creeper texture has a white part




Update 1.5 : about a month ago5/29/14-Added Ender Creepers
-You can wear any combination of ender armor and press z it will throw an enderpearl as long as you have a full set i.e.(Black Helmet, Purple Chestplate, Black Leggings, Purple Boots)
Bug Fixes:
MEP#08: Fixed ender armor crashing




Update 1.4 : about a month ago5/19/14-Added Traveler Pearls
Bug Fixes:
MEP#07: Fixed Ender Armor not showing up on body
MEP#06: some missing textures




Update 1.3.3 : about a month ago5/12/14Bug Fix:
MEP#05: Fixed missing texture for swap pearls.




Update 1.3.2 : about a month ago5/11/14-Can now make a server with this mod
-Added swap pearls
-Bows now render a different way to allow multiplayer compatibility.




Update 1.3.1 : about a month ago5/04/14Bug Fix:
MEP#04: The Purple and Black Ender Bows Render Sideways, but the other is just fine.

Another Bug added to the list of unfixed bugs:
-In Multi Player if somone holds an ender bow it makes you render strange.




Update 1.3 : about a month ago5/03/14-Updated Ender Brick Stairs Crafting Recipies
-Added Ender Bow achievment
Bug Fixes:
MEP#03: Fixed some missing texture bugs
MEP#02: Fixed wrong naming of Purple Ender Brick Stairs
MEP#01: Fixed Duplicate Stat




Update 1.2 : about a month ago5/03/14-Added 2 Colors of Ender Ingots for making different colored Items
-Added New Colors of Ender Swords
-Changed Crafting of Ender Swords
-Added New Blocks
-Added New Biomes
-New Ender Chicken Mob
-Ender Armor
-Ender Bow


Known Bugs:
-Ender Armor allows you to tp if you have a full set, a harmless ender pearl in your inventory, and are pressing z.
Pressing z without a full set of ender armor will crash the game




Update 1.1 : 2 months ago4/23/14-Added Ender Swords
-Added Ender Bones
